topStories.title: Netanyahu says he hopes to announce hostages' release in days and vows Hamas will be disarmed
topStories.description: The Israeli prime minister's comments come after Hamas agreed to release hostages under a US-proposed peace plan.

topStories.title: Shock in Gaza as Trump appears to welcome Hamas response to US peace plan
topStories.description: Hamas agreed to release the hostages and to the idea of handing over governing Gaza to Palestinian technocrats, but did not give a clear response to many other elements.

topStories.title: Sanae Takaichi set to become Japan's first female prime minister
topStories.description: Takaichi is a long-time admirer of Margaret Thatcher, but many female voters do not see her as an advocate for progress.

topStories.title: Georgia protesters try to storm Tbilisi presidential palace
topStories.description: Police used pepper spray to disperse demonstrators amid growing turmoil in the Caucasus country.

topStories.title: Hope and fear for hostage families after Hamas response to Gaza peace plan
topStories.description: Families describe a 'fragile situation', with negotiations between Israel and Hamas expected to resume.

topStories.title: 'I love you, I'm sorry': What Sean 'Diddy' Combs did the moment he learned his sentence
topStories.description: It was a more subdued message from three months ago when Combs told his family he was 'coming home'.

topStories.title: Taylor Swift says diss track is 'love letter to someone who hates me'
topStories.description: Fans are convinced the pop star's song Actually Romantic is a response to a Charli XCX track.

topStories.title: Trump's Grim Reaper - from Project 2025 to shutdown enforcer
topStories.description: The Office of Management and Budget boss may not be a household name, but he's a key figure in Washington's shutdown.
